content.metaTitle: Villa MIR0151 - Luxury 4 Bed Villa Jávea €1,285,000
content.metaDescription: Stunning new build villa in exclusive Cap Martí, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, 4 baths, 1000m² plot with pool. Minutes from Arenal beach. Turnkey luxury living.
content.heroIntro:
Discover the epitome of Mediterranean luxury living with Villa MIR0151, an exceptional new build property nestled in the prestigious Cap Martí area of Jávea. This sophisticated 4-bedroom, 4-bathroom villa represents the perfect fusion of contemporary design and natural harmony, offering panoramic views across the stunning Costa Blanca landscape from its elevated 1000m² plot.

Crafted by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana, this turnkey villa showcases meticulous attention to detail throughout its 165m² of thoughtfully designed living space. From the exquisite designer kitchen to the spacious open-plan living areas, every element has been carefully selected to create a home that embodies both elegance and comfort. The property's large panoramic windows flood the interiors with natural light while seamlessly connecting indoor and outdoor living spaces, creating an atmosphere of tranquil sophistication just minutes from Jávea's golden beaches.

locationSection.intro:
Cap Martí represents one of Jávea's most coveted residential areas, perfectly positioned between the dramatic Montgó Natural Park and the sparkling Mediterranean Sea. This exclusive enclave offers the ideal balance of privacy and convenience, surrounded by pristine natural beauty while remaining just 7 minutes from the renowned Arenal Beach and its vibrant promenade of restaurants, bars, and boutiques.

The location provides residents with the best of both worlds - a serene mountain setting with breathtaking views, yet within easy reach of all essential amenities. The charming old town of Jávea, with its traditional Thursday market and authentic Spanish atmosphere, is just a short drive away, while the port area offers excellent dining and marina facilities. This prime positioning ensures strong rental demand and excellent capital appreciation potential.
highlights: 7 minutes drive to Arenal Beach and its Blue Flag coastline
1km from local services including restaurants and supermarkets
Surrounded by Montgó Natural Park offering hiking and nature trails
15 minutes to Jávea's historic old town and traditional markets
Easy access to premium golf courses including Javea Golf Club

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0151 showcases contemporary architectural excellence with its clean lines, premium materials, and seamless indoor-outdoor living design. The property features an open-plan layout that maximizes space and light, while the extensive outdoor areas provide the perfect setting for Mediterranean entertaining and relaxation.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and natural light
4 modern bathrooms with premium fixtures and finishes
Designer kitchen with high-end appliances and island unit
Open-plan living and dining area with panoramic windows
Private swimming pool with sun terrace and outdoor shower
1000m² landscaped plot with low-maintenance Mediterranean garden
Covered terraces perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining
Premium flooring and built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms
Panoramic mountain and nature views from multiple aspects

content.investmentSection:
Jávea's property market continues to demonstrate remarkable resilience and growth, with the Cap Martí area particularly sought after by international buyers seeking luxury homes in secure, natural settings. The combination of limited available land for development, strict building regulations, and increasing demand from Northern European buyers creates strong fundamentals for capital appreciation. Properties in this exclusive area typically achieve premium rental rates during the high season, with annual yields of 5-7% achievable.

The new build status of Villa MIR0151 provides additional investment advantages, including modern energy efficiency, minimal maintenance requirements, and the latest construction standards. With Jávea's growing reputation as a year-round destination for both holidays and permanent relocation, properties of this caliber in prime locations continue to attract strong interest from discerning buyers, ensuring excellent liquidity and long-term value protection.
whyBuySection: Exclusive location in one of Jávea's most prestigious residential areas
New build villa with 10-year structural warranty and modern specifications
Turnkey delivery with premium materials and finishes included
Strong rental potential with high seasonal demand
Minutes from Blue Flag beaches and world-class amenities
Excellent capital appreciation prospects in limited supply area
Peaceful natural setting with stunning mountain views

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there any additional costs?
faqs.answer: The villa is priced at €1,285,000. Additional costs include 10% IVA (VAT), notary fees (approximately €1,500), land registry (€500), and legal fees. We can provide a detailed breakdown of all associated costs.

faqs.question: What payment terms are available for this property?
faqs.answer: Typically, a reservation deposit of €6,000 is required, followed by a private contract with 30% deposit. The remaining 70% is paid on completion. Payment plans may be negotiable depending on construction timeline.

faqs.question: How far is the villa from Arenal Beach and local amenities?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0151 is just 7 minutes drive from Arenal Beach and 1km from restaurants and supermarkets. Jávea old town is 10 minutes away, and Alicante airport is approximately 1 hour drive.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing for this property?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno mortgages who specialize in Spanish property financing for international buyers. Spanish banks typically offer up to 70% financing for non-residents. Contact us for a personalized quote.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this villa?
faqs.answer: Properties in this prime location typically achieve €2,500-4,000 per week during peak season and €1,200-2,000 in shoulder months. Annual yields of 5-7% are realistic with professional management.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed?
faqs.answer: As a new build project by Miralbo Urbana, completion timelines vary. We can provide current construction status and expected completion dates. The property will be delivered turnkey with all finishes completed.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: The villa includes fitted kitchen with appliances, built-in wardrobes, air conditioning pre-installation, landscaped garden, swimming pool, and all interior finishes. Full specifications are available on request.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of the villa?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can arrange viewings of the show villa and development site. Virtual tours are also available. Contact us on +34 634 044 970 or WhatsApp to schedule your visit.

faqs.question: What makes Cap Martí special compared to other Jávea areas?
faqs.answer: Cap Martí offers the perfect combination of exclusivity, natural beauty, and convenience. It's surrounded by protected natural parkland ensuring no overdevelopment, yet remains close to beaches and amenities.

faqs.question: Are there any community fees for this villa?
faqs.answer: As an individual villa on a private plot, there are minimal community fees. Only basic services like street lighting and waste collection apply, typically €200-400 annually depending on local municipality rates.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0151 represents an exceptional opportunity to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise in one of Costa Blanca's most exclusive locations. Don't miss your chance to secure this stunning new build villa in the prestigious Cap Martí area. Contact us today on +34 634 044 970, WhatsApp us directly, or inquire about mortgage options through our Habeno partnership to make your dream of luxury Spanish living a reality.
